display.title: Washing with Mercury
description: Washing ores with Mercury where applicable instead of &&3Distilled Water&&r grants unique byproducts that may be difficult to obtain in other circumstances. It's usually worth doing this, as Mercury is readily available from centrifuging &&cRedstone&&r or &&4Cinnabar&&r &&7(and in fact, Mercury is the &&lonly&&r&&7 real usage of Cinnabar!)&&r.
Simply wash any &&6Crushed Ore&&r with a Chemical Bath.
Here is a non-exhaustive list of ores you likely want to wash in Mercury:
These alternate "&&bwashing routes&&r" will increase your Gold, Silver, and Platinum Group yields significantly!
